hackathon-requirements:
There will be five topics in which each participant will come up with ideas and work in teams with a mentor to set up projects in the effort to solve these problems in the community:
Bring these projects to life at #SocialGoodHacks!
hackathon-rules: "Treat people they you would like to be treated". You guy's know the deal.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Each team member gets a ChromeCasts, thanks to GoogleNYC.
25$ Best Buy Gift Cards, thanks to Digital Undivided!

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=940 Garrison Avenue, Bronx, NY 10474, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How effective will this be on the community? Does this properly address the teams chosen problem? If executed, how effective will it be?

hackathon-description-header: "If the community rested in your hands, what would you build to improve it in 8 hours?”
